examples.name: float-basic
examples.content:
export const FloatBasic = () => (
  <Box position="relative" w="80px" h="80px" bg="bg.emphasized">
    <Float>
      <Circle size="5" bg="red" color="white">
        3
      </Circle>
    </Float>
  </Box>
)

examples.name: float-with-avatar
examples.content:
export const FloatWithAvatar = () => {
  return (
    <Box display="inline-block" pos="relative">
      <Avatar.Root size="lg" shape="rounded">
        <Avatar.Image src="https://bit.ly/dan-abramov" />
        <Avatar.Fallback />
      </Avatar.Root>
      <Float placement="bottom-end">
        <Badge size="sm" variant="solid" colorPalette="teal">
          New
        </Badge>
      </Float>
    </Box>
  )
}
importPaths: import { Avatar, Badge, Box, Float } from "@chakra-ui/react"

examples.name: float-with-offset-x
examples.content:
export const FloatWithOffsetX = () => (
  <Box position="relative" w="80px" h="80px" bg="bg.emphasized">
    <Float offsetX="-4">
      <Circle size="5" bg="red" color="white">
        3
      </Circle>
    </Float>
  </Box>
)

examples.name: float-with-offset-y
examples.content:
export const FloatWithOffsetY = () => (
  <Box position="relative" w="80px" h="80px" bg="bg.emphasized">
    <Float offsetY="-4">
      <Circle size="5" bg="red" color="white">
        3
      </Circle>
    </Float>
  </Box>
)

examples.name: float-with-offset
examples.content:
export const FloatWithOffset = () => (
  <Box position="relative" w="80px" h="80px" bg="bg.emphasized">
    <Float offset="4">
      <Circle size="5" bg="red" color="white">
        3
      </Circle>
    </Float>
  </Box>
)

examples.name: float-with-placements
examples.content:

{placement}

3 ))} ) const placements = [ "bottom-end", "bottom-start", "top-end", "top-start", "bottom-center", "top-center", "middle-center", "middle-end", "middle-start", ] as const
importPaths: import { Box, Circle, Float, HStack, Stack } from "@chakra-ui/react"
